name: Buza
culturalImportance: "Buza" is not a traditional alcoholic beverage of Ladakh. The local people of Ladakh, who are predominantly Buddhists, generally do not consume alcohol due to religious beliefs. Instead, they consume a salty butter tea called "Gur Gur Cha" and a fermented beverage made from barley called "Chang".
